resources.string: WARNING! Make sure your application has all settings fields filled with the correct data to avoid unnecessary complications when trying to complete a form.ΠΡΟΣΟΧΗ! Βεβαιωθειτε οτι η εφαρμογή σας έχει συμπληρωμένα όλα τα πεδια με τα σωστά δεδομένα για να αποφευχθούν περιττές περιπλοκές κατά την διάρκεια Αποστολής/Εκτύπωσης της φόρμας.
I agree and I understand the Terms & Conditions mentioned on the hotel site under here. You can scan the QR Code under the complete button to be re-directed there.

WARNING! Before proceding with the license check make sure that you have downloaded your public key file that ends with .asc . When your license gets accepted DO NOT close the application and imediatly click on the red button to insert your public key file. After that you are set to go and continue with configuring your settings.
